info.title: Uturn API documentation
info.description:
Release history

  1. V1.0.0 :- Initial version
  2. V1.0.1 :-
    • Added support for GET quotations on a shipment.
    • Added support for Assign carrier to shipment based on quote amount.
    • Changed the data-type of carrier rating in GET carrier details of a shipment from string to number.
  3. V1.0.2 :-
    • Updated POST update to shipment API call to handle update contract of carriage setup
    • Updated field descriptions related to contract update.
    • Fields related to contract update will now be processed only after carrier confirms the request.
  4. V1.0.3 :-
    • Updated POST Create a shipment and POST Update a shipment API calls.
    • productCategory field is removed and replaced by cargoDescription string field
    • requirements field is removed and replaced by requirementCodes string[] field. Multiple requirements can now be added.
  5. V1.0.4 :-
    • Added support for fetching Proof of delivery (POD) documents uploaded by carrier via API calls.
  6. V1.0.5 :-
    • Added support for uploading documents related to shipment via API calls.
  7. V1.0.6 :-
    • Added support for callback notifications.
  8. V1.0.7 :-
    • Added support for direct driver assignment.
  9. V1.1.0 :-
    • Added carrier endpoints.

Notifications

Notifications (or webhooks) serve to specify a callback url that should be invoked when an event occurs. You can contact with UTURN support to enable callback notifications. The following event types are currently supported:
  • Arrived
  • Departed
When an event occurs, the callback will be invoked with the following data:
  • shipmentNumber: Uturn unique identifier of the shipment
  • reference: Shipper reference
  • equipmentId: Container number of the shipment
  • notificationId: Event type
Below is an example response body
{
	      'shipmentNumber': 70017267,
	      'reference': 'RF87654321',
	      'equipmentId': 'SEGU9534433',
	      'notificationId': 'Arrived'
    }
After receiving a notification, you need to GET the execution details in order to receive the latest data.

post.description: Send execution events related to the shipment.
Update container related order details for a shipment.
Start, stop, execute, or finish a shipment

post.summary: Assign a carrier to the shipment.
Cancel a shipment in Uturn platform.

get.summary: Get all carrier details for a shipment.
Get execution details of a shipment.
Get cost lines for a shipment.
Get all metadata for a shipment.

post.summary: Withdraw a shipment from Uturn platform.Sets the status back to CONCEPT

quoteId.description: ID of the quoted price. This ID is used to assign a carrier to a shipment.

action.description: Whether carrier accepted the shipment or was assigned by shipper.

capabilities.description: List of capabilities provided by the carrier

oooPhone.description: Out of office phone of the carrier

capabilities.description: List of capabilities provided by the carrier

quotedId.description: ID of the quoted price. This ID is used to assign a carrier to a shipment.

approvedDate.description: Date that the cost line was approved in the platform.

description.description: Description of the cost line. Normally the shipment ID in combination with the cost type.

invoiceNumber.description: Invoice number of the related invoice (if applicable).

lineStatus.description: The status of the cost line.

reference.description: The invoice reference of the shipment.

taxCode.description: The tax code of the cost line.

totalAmount.description: Total amount of the cost line. Amount plus vatAmount.

vatAmount.description: Vat amount of the cost line.

totalExclusiveVAT.description: Total amount of the cost lines of the shipment, excluding VAT.

totalInclusiveVAT.description: Total amount of the cost lines of the shipment, including VAT.

totalVAT.description: Total VAT amount of the cost lines of the shipment.

description.description: The description of the container type

isoCode.description: The ISO-code of the container.When updating and status is Carrier Assigned, the carrier first needs to approve the update request.

acceptancePrice.description: If TRUE carriers can accept the shipment for the price. If FALSE, it is bid only. If not filled, by default FALSE

cargoDescription.description: The type of goods that are in the container

carriers.description: List of preferred carriers for this shipment. If empty, the shipment is published on the market.

driverToAssign.description: Email of driver if you want to assign the shipment directly to.

equipmentId.description: The container number of the transport order.Should be 11 characters.First 3 characters should be letters.4th character should be U, J or Z and last 7 characters should be numbers.The format is in ISO 6346.

generatorSet.description: If TRUE a generator set will be required. If not filled, by default FALSE

grossWeight.description: Weight to be loaded + tare weight of container

invoiceReference.description: Reference that will be used on the invoice. If not filled, by default UTURN shipment number

price.description: Target price of the published transport, agreed price of the preferred carrier(s).Must be greater than 0.

publishFrom.description: If not filled, by default current date time.The format is in ISO 8601

publishShipment.description: If present and true shipment will published after creation.If not present or false shipment will created as concept.

publishUntil.description: If not filled, by default stop1 Until Date time.The format is in ISO 8601

requirementCodes.description: The specific requirements for the transport.

shipmentUnit.description: The type of equipment that needs to be transported

shippingLine.description: The shipping line for this shipment used to make pre-announcements

transportStops.description: Array of minimum 2 or more stops describing the stops required to execute the transport

unCode.description: The four digit code identifying the type of hazardous goods. Required when hazardous

vat.description: If TRUE, normal VAT rules will apply. If FALSE, 0% VAT will apply on this shipment. By default FALSE

cancellationTypes.description: The list of valid shipment cancellation reasons.

invoiceLineStatusList.description: The list of valid invoice line statuses.

requirements.description: The general type of goods that are in the container, list can be provided.

shipmentUnits.description: The type of equipment that needs to be transported.

shippingLines.description: The shipping line for this shipment used to make pre-announcements.

tsoStatusList.description: The list of valid TSO statuses.

fullFileName.description: Full name of the document with extension.

code.description: Code of the file type. To be used in upload document call.

fileInBase64format.description: File in Base64 encoded format. Max uploadable size 5MB.

fileName.description: Full name of the document with extension. Allowed extensions: pdf, doc, docx, jpeg, jpg, png, tif, tiff, bmp, xls, xlsx, csv

fileType.description: Code of the file type. Values can be retrieved from meta-data call.

fileInBase64format.description: File in Base64 encoded format. Max uploadable size 5MB.

fileName.description: Full name of the document with extension. Allowed extensions: pdf, doc, docx, jpeg, jpg, png, tif, tiff, bmp, xls, xlsx, csv

sequenceNumber.description: Sequence number of the location action.

type.description: Type of the event. Values are case sensitive.

code.description: The SCAC-code of the shipping line (code list can be retrieved in GetMetadata)

name.description: The name of the shipping line

equipmentId.description: The container number of the transport order

transportStops.description: Array of minimum 2 or more stops describing the stops required to execute the transport

tsoStatus.example: In Progress, Executed, Invoiced, Cancelled, Cost Declared

city.description: City. Required if creating new address in portal.

countryCode.description: Country code based on ISO 3 letter code. Required if creating new address in portal.

houseNumber.description: Address number. Required if creating new address in portal.

lat.description: Latitude of the location. Required if creating new address in portal.

lon.description: Longitude of the location. Required if creating new address in portal.

name.description: Name of the location, which will be used to map the location in UTURN

postalCode.description: Postal code. Required if creating new address in portal.

street.description: Name of the street. Required if creating new address in portal.

uniqueLocationId.description: Unique location identifier from the shipper.

actualArrival.description: Actual arrival of carrier for this location.The format is ISO-8601 local date

actualDeparture.description: Actual departure of carrier for this location.The format is ISO-8601 local date

eta.description: ETA for this location.The format is ISO-8601 local date

from.description: Start of window for this location.When updating and status is Carrier Assigned, the carrier first needs to approve the update request.

location.description: The location of the stop.Address details (street, houseNumber, city etc.) are only needed when the location is unknown, Google Maps API will be used to determine the exact location.When updating and status is Carrier Assigned, the carrier first needs to approve the update request.

reference.description: Reference needed to interact with the location

remarks.description: Additional instructions for the carrier for this location

sequenceNumber.description: The execution order of this stop in the transport

shippingLine.description: The shipping line for this stop to make pre-announcements, if it's different than the one specified in shipment

until.description: End of window for this location.When updating and status is Carrier Assigned, the carrier first needs to approve the update request.

action.description: Set the action to be performed. START: start the shipment; STOP: stop the shipment; EXECUTE: Execute the shipment, for example when the shipment is executed, but no proof of delivery is available yet; FINISH: finish the shipment when a proof of delivery is uploaded. Values are case sensitive.

acceptancePrice.description: If TRUE carriers can accept the shipment for the price. If FALSE, it is bid only.By default FALSE.

cargoDescription.description: The general description of goods that are in the container.

carriers.description: List of preferred carriers for this shipment. If empty, the shipment is published on the market.

equipmentId.description: The container number of the transport order.Should be 11 characters.First 3 characters should be letters.4th character should be U, J or Z and last 7 characters should be numbers.

generatorSet.description: If TRUE a generator set will be required. If not filled, by default FALSE.When updating and status is Carrier Assigned, the carrier first needs to approve the update request.

grossWeight.description: Weight to be loaded + tare weight of container.When updating and status is Carrier Assigned, the carrier first needs to approve the update request.

invoiceReference.description: Reference that will be used on the invoice.

price.description: Target price of the published transport, agreed price of the preferred carrier(s).Must be greater than 0.

publishFrom.description: Date time to publish shipment from.The format is in ISO 8601

publishUntil.description: Date time to publish shipment until.The format is in ISO 8601

requirementCodes.description: The specific requirements for the transport. When updating and status is Carrier Assigned, the carrier first needs to approve the update request.

shipmentNumber.description: Shipment number. Not required during creation of shipment.

shipmentUnit.description: The type of equipment that needs to be transported

shippingLine.description: The shipping line for this shipment used to make pre-announcements

transportStops.description: Array of minimum 2 or more stops describing the stops required to execute the transport

unCode.description: The four digit code identifying the type of hazardous goods. Required when hazardous.When updating and status is Carrier Assigned, the carrier first needs to approve the update request.

vat.description: If TRUE, normal VAT rules will apply. If FALSE, 0% VAT will apply on this shipment.By default FALSE.

containerNumber.description: The container number of the transport order. The format is in ISO 6346.

paymentReference.description: Your custom reference number which will be visible on payment lines for this shipment.

seal.description: The seal number of the shipment.

tare.description: Tare value of the container in kg's.
